explains: n. 毒品；药物；运动禁药；成瘾之事
v. 使服麻醉药；（在食物或饮料中）投放麻醉药；<非正式>吸毒

sentences.en: Side effects from the drug are uncommon.
A drug that constricts the blood vessels.
